pages.text: Even if you have a lot of protection poppet they are sometimes simply not enough. They don't protect against every damage source and can also break at the most inconvenient times. $(br)The Death Protection Poppet is your ultimate life anchor. It can save you from all forms of death, except falling into the void.
It takes the powers of the Totem of Undying and increases them with the feet of a rabbit and two gold apples to accomplish this feat.
